short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Construct custom Web Socket requests and handle responses to directly test your Web Socket services.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple WebSocket Client is an extension for Google Chrome to help construct custom Web Socket requests and handle responses to directly test your Web Socket services.
